Class EdgeFilter

java.lang.Object
  EdgeFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Filter
public class EdgeFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Filter

Creates a filter to identify the edges in a photo, and then to change the composition so that the photo becomes similar to a colouring book page
